name: Pepecola
description: What is the project about? The project is about a memecoin called PepeCola, created by the Dogecola team. What makes your project unique? The combination of cola marketing and cryptocurrency ownership makes the project unique. History of your project. The team previously launched Dogecola and is now capturing the spotlight with PepeCola due to Pepe's strong presence. Whatâ€™s next for your project?
